name: TemporaryStations_X_c
title: Temporary Stations X (Wait Conditions and Personal Trains)
author: Xaver222
description:
The mod lets you control the behaviour of trains upon arriving at temporary stations. The train either switches to manual mode or waits with custom conditions.
You can also define a Train as your Personal Train and use the shortcut to call that train to your position.

Use the command /tsx-setdefault and select a Train to use its first Station as new default Temp Station settings
Use the command /tsx-config for reset of personal Train and display Help Window.
